title: DATS grant schema
description: An allocated sum of funds given by a government or other organization for a particular purpose.

name.description: The name of the grant and its funding program.

funders.description: a property to specify the person(s) or organization(s) which has awarded the funds supporting the project.

awardees.description: a property to specify the person(s) or organization(s) which received the funds supporting the project.

funds.description: a property to specify the study or dataset supported by the grant.
